subject: Re: And what the heck is it?  Tks.
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Huh!? That's stuff I would completely ignore, ya can't even tell if those are words, or just random sounds. Same old stuff, complicate the crap out of it, add useless junk like an EMF meter, and then build in expectations. You're gonna hear all kinds of stuff that can be taken as intelligent sounds. Then, get all pissy cuz I disagree with the average ghost hunter. 

 F-S
